attributes.action: Plant a tree for each child in the UK creat environmental legacy
attributes.additional_details: Encourage a sense of the environment in the young by giving them a personal living legacy in the future. A tree planting scheme could introduce children especially those in urban areas to become personally invested in their environment. At the same time we would be replacing some of out lost vegetation whilst helping cut future greenhouse gases. If we're going to loose out existing forests then lets plant some new ones.
